alert.note: Alert for Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 30 at 7:04PM MDT until May 30 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN JACKSON AND SOUTHEASTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 704 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northeastern Badlands National Park, or 29 miles southwest of Philip, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Interior, Cactus Flat, Cedar Pass, Delta 1 Launch Facility, Minuteman Missile Visitors Center and Pinnacles Ranger Station. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 126 and 131. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
